customer_reviews.title: Nice instrument - Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this instrument a 5 star rating because it is a very nice instrument at an absolutely fantastic price. I ordered this for my middle school daughter to play in band. It works well, looks very nice and shipped very quickly. I have no idea about the quality of the horn - I only know that it sounded good to us and everything seems to work just fine. Amazon shipped this very quickly and it arrived in mint condition, with a great padded carrying case. Overall, we were very impressed and the price was less than 5 months rental.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it! Cheaper than renting it for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Cheaper than renting it for the school year. I also purchased the 3 year musical instrument protection plan. I know some reviews had some complaints about sticky valves but I've seen that happen with $1200 units as well. We've noticed that oiling and cleaning after each use will prevent that.

customer_reviews.title: Valve issues in one short year
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a problem with KK Music, but Mendini by Cecilio buyer beware. I ordered a Mendini by Cecilio baritone through KK Music Store from Amazon. A short year later, it broke (valve issue). I took it to a reputable music store based on recommendation from our school and was told it "needs new valve guide". Apparently this is something they cannot fix. I am afraid I was sold a lemon, with plastic parts that do not have easy to find replacements. Of course, this all happened just outside the one-year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: The G's

customer_reviews.title: These horns are junk. Do not buy anything of ...
customer_reviews.text: These horns are junk. Do not buy anything of this brand. I am so sick of seeing these show up in my band. The kids just struggle with them and get frustrated. They are NOT durable by any stretch of the imagination and they have major intonation problems. DO NOT BUY!

product_meta.title: Mendini B Flat Baritone with Stainless Steel Pistons (Beginner)
product_meta.description: Color:BeginnerMendini by Cecilio MBR-20 baritone horn is in the key of Bb. It is lightweight and ideal for the student musicians. Equipped with a medium bore tubing, upright 9" bell and 3 top action valves with stainless steel pistons allow for easy playability and sound projection.
feature_bullets: Lacquered yellow brass body and bell standard Bb baritone horn
Lightweight, .528" bore, 9" upright bell, 3 stainless steel smooth top action pistons
Includes: silver plated mouthpiece, pro-deluxe hard case, polishing cloth and a pair of gloves
Bonus: Cecilio 92-D chromatic/string tuner with metronome
